subject: RE: Invoice
body:
Are you lacking academic certification? Is it stopping you from getting a =

Most of the sheet metal cutting is done with a band saw or saber saw. (sto=
p picture) Practice with scrap to be sure you have the right blade. I use =
a 1/4" 16 TPI blade for this. Some suggest 18 TPI, 3/8-1/2 inch blade.=20
